visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Monthly Sales Data', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark background with white text for labels and titles, Data series: Series 1 - 'Sales' with data [100, 120, 130, 140, 150, 160, 170, 180, 190, 200, 210, 220], Custom colors: Use a gradient from blue to green, Additional configurations: Set chart margins to 50px, add a legend at the bottom, and use a logarithmic color axis with custom conversion to allow negative values.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with a dark background and white text for labels and titles. The chart displays monthly sales data with a series named 'Sales' and data points ranging from 100 to 220. The color axis is set to logarithmic with custom conversion to allow negative values, and a gradient from blue to green is applied. The chart includes a legend at the bottom and has margins set to 50px. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart that meets the specified requirements.
